sentences.sContent: A lot of TV advertising is aimed at susceptible young children.
sentences.sCn: 很多电视广告瞄准了易受影响的幼儿。

synos.tran: 易受影响的；易感动的；容许…的

phrases.pCn: 易受感染菌株；感性品系

remMethod.val: sus(在…下面) ＋ cept(接受) ＋ ible → 在影响下容易接受的 → 易受影响的

trans.tranOther: likely to suffer from a particular illness or be affected by a particular problem
